CustomField.formula: "&solmgr=1" + "&username=" + $User.Username + "&id=" + Id + "&queryid= [LineItems]aHkD70000004Dr5KAE,[LineItems1]aHkD70000004Dr0KAE,[Acct]aHkD70000004DrFKAU,[Order]aHkD70000004Ds3KAE" + "&templateid=aHsD70000008PsxKAE" + "&fp0=1" + "&ac1=Invoice Generated" + "&sc0=1" + "&sc1=SalesforceFile" + "&ofn=Invoice for " + blng__Account__c + " - " + TEXT(TODAY()) + "&ac0=1" + "&templategroup=Invoice" + "&xdo=CIA" + "&xdo2=GenerateInvoice" + "&geo=" + $User.Country + "&emailtoid=" + blng__BillToContact__r.Id + "&EmailAdditionalTo=" + Additional_emails_to_send__c + "&congaemailtemplateid=aHjD70000004D4HKAU" + "&qmode=SendEmail"
CustomField.label: Invoice Document
